experiences.title: Freelance AI & Data Science Consultant
experiences.subtitle: Self-Employed / Multiple Clients
workDescription: Delivered **8+ end-to-end AI solutions** to startups, nonprofits, and small businesses.
Built **LLM-powered research bots**, **RAG frameworks**, and **predictive models** tailored to client-specific problems.
Deployed solutions using **Docker, FastAPI**, and **Streamlit**, ensuring scalability and quick iteration cycles.
Worked directly with founders and technical teams to shape product direction and ML roadmap.

experiences.title: LangChain & GenAI Systems Developer
experiences.subtitle: Independent Projects
workDescription: Built full-stack GenAI prototypes using **LangChain**, **LlamaIndex**, and **OpenAI API**.
Designed autonomous agents for tasks like stock research, document summarization, and chatbot interfaces.
Created reusable codebases and mini-frameworks for smart LLM pipelines, integrated with custom UIs.

experiences.title: AI Research & Engineering Intern
experiences.subtitle: Startup/NGO Collaborations
workDescription: Collaborated on research-driven ML projects in NLP and predictive analytics.
Worked on **fake news detection**, **student performance prediction**, and **text summarization** tools using scikit-learn and HuggingFace.
